alert.note: Alert for Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Mobile, Baldwin, northwestern Santa Rosa and northwestern Escambia Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 344 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles east of Mount Vernon to 4 miles southwest of Chunchula to 5 miles north of Wade. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Bay Minette, Foley, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Grand Bay, Robertsdale, Bayou La Batre, Creola, Dauphin Island, Loxley, Stockton, Magnolia Springs, Stapleton and Axis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
